title: Facials - Serenity Rose Massage & Wellness
cleaned_text: Facial Services Relax Signature Facial:For All Skin Types 60 Min. -$95 Our nourishing, antioxidant rich signature facial is designed to address your skin's specific needs, promoting vibrant and healthy skin. This treatment includes a gentle exfoliant to refine and smooth skin texture, a luxurious facial massage using our signature essential oil blend, a clarifying masque and botanical extracts to aid in nutrient absorption and eliminating harmful toxins. The Relax facial restores and protects the beautiful, radiant skin you deserve. Renew Anti-Aging Facial: For All Skin Types especially Mature 60 Min. — $105 This exhilarating ageless treatment offers luxury, anti-aging efficacy, and absolute wellness. Our Golden serum penetrates the skin to deliver a mega-dose of potent antioxidants and green tea extracts to help combat the effects of free radicals, the aging process, sun damage and pollution. This coupled with our silky firming lotion specifically formulated for the delicate tissue surrounding the eyes, work powerfully to reduce the visible signs of aging and give the complexion an immediate glow. Perfect for dull and dry skin types and those in need of hydration. Best done in a series or as a monthly anti-aging maintenance program for progressive firming and rejuvenating results. Restore Clarifying & Purifying Treatment: For Oily, Combination and Acne-Prone Skin types 60 Min. — $90 This intensive skin repairing facial helps to unclog pores, absorb excess oils, regulate and balance the skin, while reducing the appearance of acne. A synergistic blend of ingredients utilizing the most effective and calming botanicals are used to treat all grades of acne; soothing and restoring the skin's natural PH. The treatment begins with a cleansing massage to loosen up dead skin cells, followed by a delicate re-surfacing mask that is lightly steamed on the skin to soften, exfoliate, and deep clean. An in-depth skin analysis and light extraction follow to purify and balance the skin. The result? Not only are blemishes banished and large pores visibly diminished, but overall skin quality, tone and smoothness are enhanced as well. Particularly effective for sensitive, reactive skin and those with a congested texture. Restore your skins natural beauty with this healing treatment. Gentlemen's Facial 60 Min.- $95 Specially tailored for a man's skin, this facial uses products formulated to soften and hydrate the skin while addressing concerns such as irritation caused by shaving, ingrown hairs and breakouts, reducing the appearance of sun damage and fine lines. We incorporate an aromatic blend of essential oils that provides the ultimate therapeutic experience for him. (Custom Facial) Back Facial 60 Min. -$105 This decadent treatment though relaxing is best used for cleansing those tough-to-reach spots, detoxifying clogged pores, clearing back acne, and hydrating skin. Like a regular facial, the back facial incorporates deep cleansing of the back to remove excess oil and debris, gentle steaming to open pores and lift impurities, followed by painless extractions if necessary, exfoliation, and a purifying mask. The back facial also includes a relaxing neck and shoulder massage. Leaving behind only fresh, clean, and glowing skin. For best results, repeat every three to four weeks. The Gentleman's Retreat: 90 Min.- $140 Immerse yourself in a variety of experiences intended to replenish your body and renew your spirit. Complete with a balancing and restorative mini facial, followed by a customized massage to relax tense muscles and encourage the flow of oxygen to cells, and our nutrient rich exfoliating foot scrub to top this incredible experience. This transformative treatment will leave you feeling tranquil and nurtured. Created just for HIM! Euphoria: 90 Min.- $135 This is the perfect indulgence to lavish your skin with a radiant glow.
